version_description:
Added new on-demand shows from FOX.
Added the following NBC Sports Region Network live channels: CSN Bay Area, CSN California and CSN Chicago
Added ability to watch Viacom live channels when away from home.
Improved the load time of favorite channels on the Apple Watch app.
Fixed several bugs and made performance improvements.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Added TV/device content recommendation switch to My U-verse
Added 'available until' to on-demand show details
Added numeric keypad to Apple Watch remote control
Added 'New' indicator to Apple Watch show details screen
Added show times to 'NEXT' listing information in Live TV guide
Improved loading performance of show images
Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Added on-demand shows from Disney and ABC
Added watched-progress indicator to show details screen
Added 'available until' date to on-demand show details screen
Improved recording-conflict notifications on 38mm Apple Watch
Reduced sound volume when tapping a remote-control key
Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Use 'Hide SD Channels' to focus on HD programming
Jump right into the next episode with On Demand binge mode
Use Spotlight Search on iOS 9 to find your favorite shows in the U-verse app
Stream shows and movies from ABC and Disney over a cellular connection
Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

* Resolves the "too many simultaneous streams" error some users saw while trying to stream VoD
* Search DVR recordings using iOS 9 Spotlight Search
* Improved HD filtering
* Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Bugfixes and usability enhancements.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

* Remote control improvements
* Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

* Fixed loss of remote control functionality when app was in background
* Miscellaneous additional improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

IPv6 Compliant

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

New - Data Free TV! Stream U-verse Live and On Demand shows anywhere, without using mobile data! Only with AT&T and U-verse. Restrictions apply.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Fixes crash on startup on iOS 10. We are aware of and working to resolve additional startup crashes. If you are experiencing crashes, please mention your iOS version number and device model in your app store review, as it will help us troubleshoot faster.

New - Data Free TV! Stream U-verse Live and On Demand shows anywhere, without using mobile data! Only with AT&T and U-verse. Restrictions apply.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Fixes several start-up crashes.

If you still experience crashes after upgrading, please mention your iOS version number and device model in your app store review, as it will help us troubleshoot faster.

If you are having trouble upgrading your app to the latest version, please uninstall the app and reinstall from the App Store.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

> Crash fixes
> Friendlier error messages
> Various bugfixes and usability enhancements

If you are having trouble upgrading your app to the latest version, please uninstall the app and reinstall from the App Store.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• 10-second skip forward button added to On Demand player
• Made it easier to record shows on HD channels
• Improved remote control error messages
• Fixed issue where sometimes On Demand network mistakenly appear locked
• Various crash fixes, bug fixes, and usability enhancements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Updated for ongoing support NBCU networks
• Video playback improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• Predictive search
• Popular search suggestions
• On Demand skip-back button changed from 30 to 10 seconds
• More user-friendly Remote Control error messages
• New analytics engine to help us better understand the app’s performance and usage

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• Added closed captioning and secondary audio buttons to the remote control (for use with paired Set-Top Boxes)
• Added VoiceOver screenreader compatibility

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• Visual predictive search
• Display available DVR space
• Bugfixes and usability improvements

• On Demand bookmarks synced across your devices – stop playback on one device, resume on another
• When binge-watching an On Demand series, the ‘Watched’ screen will present the latest episode you’ve watched
• Improved On Demand sorting helps you find the hottest new shows
• Improved On Demand video player UI – bigger buttons, easier to use
• Improved Predictive Search
• Many bugfixes & usability enhancements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• Log in with your AT&T Access ID
• Improved On Demand sorting makes it easier to find shows you love
• Many bugfixes & usability enhancements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• iOS compatibility
• Added genre filtering for Live TV
• Added ‘New’ filter for On Demand
• Added optional skipping of longer ads
• Other bugfixes, usability enhancements, and video streaming stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!"

•Fixed issue with Favorites not being saved
•Other bugfixes, usability enhancements, and video streaming stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

Bug fixes, usability enhancements, and video streaming stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• NEW! Add On Demand shows to your Watchlist to easily enjoy them later!
• Improved sports team searching
• iPhone X UI improvements
• Bugfixes, usability enhancements, and video streaming stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• Improvements related to Spanish language programs
• Fixed issue where completed VOD movie can’t be restarted
• Improved loading experience
• Improved performance on iOS 11 and iPhone X
• Bugfixes, usability enhancements, and video streaming stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. Enjoy AT&T U-verse!

• You can now designate favorite Sports Teams and receive notifications of upcoming games!
• Bugfixes, usability enhancements, and video streaming stability improvements
